statements: SELECT * FROM Parents;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Parents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT id, phone_number FROM Parents ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT id, email FROM Parents WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Parents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM Parents WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM Parents WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM parents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT parent_name AS Name, address AS Address FROM parents WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description, organizer_name FROM events WHERE organizer_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT parent_name, address, phone_number FROM parents WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT child_name, child_age FROM children WHERE parent_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id;
SELECT * FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, child_name FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, child_name FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id WHERE child_age > 5
SELECT parent_name AS ParentName, child_name AS ChildName FROM parents JOIN children ON parents.parent_id = children.parent_id
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM events
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT firstname, lastname FROM parents WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT id, firstname, lastname FROM children WHERE age >= 10 ORDER BY lastname ASC;
SELECT e.id, e.event_date, s.name as school_name FROM events e JOIN schools s ON e.school_id = s.id;
SELECT p.firstname, p.lastname, c.firstname as child_firstname, c.lastname as child_lastname, e.event_description FROM parents p JOIN children c ON p.id = c.parent_id JOIN events e ON c.id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT firstname, lastname FROM parents WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM children WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY lastname DESC, firstname ASC;
SELECT schools.name, schools.location, COUNT(events.id) AS num_events FROM schools LEFT JOIN events ON schools.id = events.school_id GROUP BY schools.name, schools.location;

SELECT p.firstname AS parent_firstname, c.firstname AS child_firstname, e.event_date FROM parents p JOIN children c ON p.id = c.parent_id JOIN events e ON c.id = e.school_id WHERE e.event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT child_name, child_age FROM children WHERE child_age > 10;
SELECT school_name, school_address FROM schools WHERE school_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT parent_name, child_name, child_age FROM parents JOIN parent_children ON parents.parent_id = parent_children.parent_id JOIN children ON parent_children.child_id = children.child_id;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, parent_phone FROM parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT child_name, child_age, parent_id FROM children WHERE child_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT school_name, school_address FROM schools WHERE school_id = 1 ORDER BY school_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT pc.parent_id, pc.child_id, p.parent_name, c.child_name FROM parent_children pc JOIN parents p ON pc.parent_id = p.parent_id JOIN children c ON pc.child_id = c.child_id WHERE pc.parent_id = 1;
